title: Slab Serif Display Font
content:
Any ideas? Closest I came to was Chunk from the League of Movable Type, but I'm not sure.  
Thanks.

Font: 

 Serifa 

Solved By: 

 [bojev](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417034610/http:/typophile.com/user/7409 "View user profile.")

author: pjburgess

comments.content:
Novocento Slab Bold comes close, but not quite:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/synthview/novecento-slab/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417034610/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/synthview/novecento-slab/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/synthview/novecento-slab/")

But I think Serifa Black gets all the details right:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/tilde/serifa/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417034610/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tilde/serifa/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/tilde/serifa/")
